label: 12delta vacuum pressure from 26D->4D projection
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Use registry values
ROOTS = reg.roots_total  # 288
b3 = reg.b3              # 24

# Projection tax: Lambda_base = (b3/2) / ROOTS^2
# 12/288^2 where 12 = b3/2
lambda_numerator = b3 // 2  # 12
lambda_base = lambda_numerator / (ROOTS ** 2)
result = lambda_base  # 1.44676e-4
